title: Activating Team Learning in Military Contexts Through Learning-Oriented Leadership

context.prior_knowledge: Core Leadership Concepts in Organizations and Team Collaboration Experience
context.additional_context: Explores leadership strategies to facilitate team learning in hierarchical organizational environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more leadership techniques that foster psychological equality.
Learners can design two actionable strategies to facilitate team learning in hierarchical team environments.
The impact of learning-oriented leadership on team performance can be evaluated through case analysis
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
